title: Ring in 2018 Like a Local at These Spectacular SF Events

seo_title: Ring in 2018 Like a Local at These Spectacular SF Events
meta_description: Ring in 2018 Like a Local at These Spectacular SF Events
short_description: Whether your 2017 was a year to remember or an obstacle course filled with unexpected challenges, here’s to a new year and new beginnings! The city has plenty of things happening that will help you #LayDownTracks for the new year.
long_description:
Whether your 2017 was a year to remember or an obstacle course filled with unexpected challenges, here’s to a new year and new beginnings! At SCH we’ve got a holiday package to help you establish a little home away from home for a few days. And the city has plenty of things happening that will help you #LayDownTracks for the new year.

New Year’s Eve Fireworks

The classic New Year’s Eve celebration! Fireworks will launch from barges located 1,000 feet out in the bay just south of the Ferry Building near Pier 14. The show usually lasts for about 15 minutes starting at midnight and is even synced to music.
Where: Embarcadero from Mission to Folsom
Cost: Free!

Speakeasy New Years Eve Cruise 2018

Presented by SF Nightlife, get ready for a special event aboard the Fume Blanc — the Speakeasy 2018 New Year's Eve Cruise! For the seventh year in a row, the most popular New Year's Eve event in San Francisco is back. This themed event will transport you back to the 20s as you'll be surrounded by a slew of movers and shakers all decked to the nines.
Where:
Fume Blanc Commodore
8 The Embarcadero
San Francisco, CA 94111
Cost: $299

Thai Temple Festival

Join revelers at Osha Thai Embarcadero, and ring in 2018 at one of San Francisco's best locations for fireworks on the bay. This year's event theme is Thai Temple Festival. Recreate the unmistakable atmosphere and experience of a Thai Temple Festival with numerous booths offering house cuts of grilled Kobe-style beef steak, coast-to-coast seafood and oysters, Osha’s signature dishes, and a sweets and candy bar.
Where:
Osha Thai Restaurant & Lounge
4 Embarcadero Center
San Francisco, CA 94111
Cost: $60 - $180

Party Like It's 1999!

Bid adieu to 2017 Prince style — bay area band Trace Repeat will be bringing their raucous old-school funk to Ferment.Drink.Repeat. Your ticket includes your first craft beer, party favors, light fare, desserts, and a champagne toast at midnight!
Where:
Ferment Drink Repeat - FDR Brewery
2636 San Bruno Avenue
San Francisco, CA 94134
Cost: $55

An EPIC New Year's Eve 2017

Have an incredible sit-down dinner at EPIC Steak, and then head out to your New Year’s Eve party or stick around for the restaurant's own celebration. They have ticket options to accommodate both strategies — leave early or stay late! First seating gets a four course menu. Second seating gets a five-course menu plus party hats, favors, a midnight a champagne toast and fireworks. The view of San Francisco Bay is great!
Where:
EPIC Steak
369 The Embarcadero
San Francisco, CA 94105
Cost: $150 - $225
